subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Tyson Chandler, the Knicks’ leading rebounder and shot-blocker, could be unavailable for Game 1 against Miami because of a fever and other flulike symptoms.
snippet: Tyson Chandler, the Knicks’ leading rebounder and shot-blocker, could be unavailable for Game 1 against Miami because of a fever and other flulike symptoms.
